name: The Hot Escape
description:
You wake up inside of a cave and the last thing you remember is going on a trip with your friends..

Now as you find your friends, you also have to find a way to escape from this cave..

Why is it so warm in here?

The Hot Escape is a fully functioning Third Person Platformer level that requires players to carefully navigate their way out of a collapsing cave through jumping.

The most apparent danger is the Lava that is slowly covering your exit. You have to be careful or you will get caught.

The level is split into Four main sections

1. Starter/Introduction room

2. Main/Key Room (includes locked door)

3. Final Stage (an intense section for the end!)

4. Outdoors/End

--

CONTROLS

-----------

'W A S D' to move

'E' to interact

'Space' to jump

All the assets can be found in the Epic Games Marketplace.

Size: ~1Gb

Thank you for playing!

NOTES

------------

Built in Unreal Engine 4 (ver 4.26.1)

Mouse + Keyboard support only

Windows 64-bit support only
